New Records: Australia secured a 3-1 victory over China, reviving World Cup qualification hopes
Key Match Events: Nishan Velupillay scored twice, including in stoppage time, to secure the win for Australia
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Tony Popovic emphasized the importance of the match saying, 'It's a great win for the team and a step towards our World Cup goal'
Post-Match Reflections: The victory has reignited confidence in the Socceroos' ability to qualify for the 2026 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Adelaide Oval in front of 46,219 fans
Others: The match was a crucial moment in Australia's World Cup qualification campaign
